00001 #include <sys/wait.h>
00002 #include <stdlib.h>
00003 #include <unistd.h>
00004 #include <stdio.h>
00005 
00006 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00007 {
00008     pid_t cpid, w;
00009     int status;
00010     cpid = fork();
00011     if (cpid == -1) { perror("fork"); exit(EXIT_FAILURE); }
00012     if (cpid == 0) {            /* Code executed by child */
00013         printf("Child PID is %ld\n", (long) getpid());
00014         if (argc == 1)
00015             pause();                    /* Wait for signals */
00016         _exit(atoi(argv[1]));
00017     } else {                    /* Code executed by parent */
00018         do {
00019             w = waitpid(cpid, &status, WUNTRACED | WCONTINUED);
00020             if (w == -1) { perror("waitpid"); exit(EXIT_FAILURE); }
00021             if (WIFEXITED(status)) {
00022                 printf("exited, status=%d\n", WEXITSTATUS(status));
00023             } else if (WIFSIGNALED(status)) {
00024                 printf("killed by signal %d\n", WTERMSIG(status));
00025             } else if (WIFSTOPPED(status)) {
00026                 printf("stopped by signal %d\n", WSTOPSIG(status));
00027             } else if (WIFCONTINUED(status)) {
00028                 printf("continued\n");
00029             }
00030         } while (!WIFEXITED(status) && !WIFSIGNALED(status));
00031         exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00032     }
00033 }
